'''Radiant Spincrystal 134''' is an item used in any [[Furnishing]] of the [[Euphonium Unbound]] series to unlock a [[Soundtrack]] ''[[When Rain Clouds Gather]]'' in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

It is located on a table in the [[Stadium of the Sacred Flame]], overlooking the combat arena.
